org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io

Class BoundedDelegatingInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.DelegatingInputStream
          • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.BoundedDelegatingInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class BoundedDelegatingInputStream
extends DelegatingInputStream
    This is a stream that will only supply bytes from its delegate up to a certain limit. When there is an attempt to set the position beyond that it will signal that the input is finished.

      • available

        public int available()
              throws IOException
        Overrides:
        available in class FilterInputStream
        Returns:

        Throws:
        IOException
